name: EscapeFromTheLaboratory
description:
You're alien, who trying to escape secret laboratory. But Scientists disassembled your space craft to spares. You need to collect all the spares and try not to get catch! You're radioactive, so scientists can "feel" your trail. Lucky you, all walls in lab made of  lead, so you can hide your trail behind them ;)

To win game, you need to collect at least 20 parts
